title: Is this OCD or are they trolling people?
selftext: The number just seems to convenient.
comments: 11,11,111 crore, add them it become 7 (Thala for a reason)
This means research, education, and healthcare likely lose.
Agar universe dil se tumhareey saath ho toh, puri government tunhey angel number dikhaney ki shajis me mil jaati hai
